properties.body:
ITALY-NORTHEAST COAST.
ADRIATIC SEA.
AIRCRAFT DITCHED IN 44-18-47N 012-36-25E
AT 281850Z JAN. ONE PERSON MISSING. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 06 5924145 OR
39 06 59084409, FAX: 39 06 5922737 OR 39 06 59084793,
E-MAIL: CGCP3REP4@MIT.GOV.IT OR ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
